item.title: CVE-2023-32567|2023-11-03T18:13:19.987Z -- ivanti -- wavelink
item.description: Ivanti Avalanche decodeToMap XML External Entity Processing. Fixed in version 6.4.1.236

item.title: CVE-2023-46217|2023-12-19T15:43:26.322Z -- ivanti -- wavelink
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.
